## Mock.rejectsWith() method

Sets the error rejected by calls to the Mock.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rejectsWith(error: any): Mock<ARGS, RETURN>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | any | error to be thrown. |
